title: An exact narrative of the tryal and condemnation of John Twyn for printing and dispersing of a treasonable book with the tryals of Thomas Brewster, bookseller, Simon Dover, printer, Nathan Brooks, bookbinder, for printing, publishing, and uttering of seditious, scandalous, and malitious pamphlets : at Justice-Hall in the Old-Bayly, London, the 20th, and 22th of February, 1663/4.
author: Twyn, John, d. 1664.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Mabb for Henry Brome ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
